title: Diamond/Plat Team LF Jungler.
body:
Highly serious and dedicated team looking for a jungler, our previous jungler wasn't really able to keep up with the team and so he was let go. We're looking for a jungler who can play at least some of these champs:
Rek'sai
Lee sin
Elise
J4
Zac
(At least some)

The team requires a heavy ganking jungler with preference to mid in order to snowball early game comps with deep vision and map control.

If interested Reply here or add me(Vicenza) or Scrillix

replies.body: I would like to apply for the team. I main zac and rek'sai and am currently learning elise.
